text:
Apple | Cupertino, CA | FULL-TIME | ONSITE

We are a new, small team in Apple Maps that is growing rapidly and developing new technologies for our next-gen maps. Our dev team is looking for senior-level engineers with experience in Java or C++. We are experimenting and rapidly iterating on new ideas and with new technology including machine learning and computer vision recognition.

Send an intro email + resume to jnettles@apple.com.
